application.name: leisa2isis
application.brief: Import New Horizons LEISA files into ISIS format

description.p: This program will import FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) formatted files from the New Horizons LEISA instument into the ISIS format.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: A New Horizons LEISA FITS file to be converted to an ISIS cube
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename of a New Horizons LEISA file to be converted to a cube. This is expected to be a FITS formatted file. The associated PDS label file must be located in the same directory.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the main image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will contain the New Horizons LEISA image in ISIS format.

parameter.name: ERRORMAP
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the error image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will containing the New Horizons LEISA error extension data as an cube in ISIS format. The error extension image must be in the fifth FITS extension (i.e., sixth image).

parameter.name: QUALITY
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the quality image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will containing the New Horizons LEISA quality extension data as an cube in ISIS format. The quality extension image must be in the sixth FITS extension (i.e., seventh image).
